mapper.select: SELECT sp.postId postId, sp.postName postName, GROUP_CONCAT(se.empName) postEmpName, so.orgName, so.orgPath FROM multiplescore_post_range mr LEFT JOIN staffing_post sp ON sp.postId = mr.postLowerId LEFT JOIN staffing_post_emp spe ON spe.postId = mr.postLowerId LEFT JOIN staffing_emp se ON se.empId = spe.empId LEFT JOIN staffing_org so ON so.orgId = sp.orgId WHERE postHigherId = #{postId} GROUP BY sp.postId;

SELECT sp.postId postId, sp.postName postName, GROUP_CONCAT(se.empName) postEmpName, so.orgName, so.orgPath FROM staffing_post sp LEFT JOIN staffing_post_emp spe ON spe.postId = sp.postId LEFT JOIN staffing_emp se ON se.empId = spe.empId LEFT JOIN staffing_org so ON so.orgId = sp.orgId WHERE sp.postId NOT IN ( SELECT mr.postLowerId FROM multiplescore_post_range mr WHERE mr.postHigherId = #{postId} ) GROUP BY sp.postId;
